title: Smart Data Models - ExcBBC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Transformer fed static excitation system (static with ABB regulator). This model represents a static excitation system in which a gated thyristor bridge fed by a transformer at the main generator terminals feeds the main generator directly.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcBBC

efdmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum open circuit exciter voltage (Efdmax).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

efdmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum open circuit exciter voltage (Efdmin).  Typical Value = -5. Default: 0.0

k.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Steady state gain (K).  Typical Value = 300. Default: 0.0

switch.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Supplementary signal routing selector (switch). true = Vs connected to 3rd summing point false =  Vs connected to 1st summing point (see diagram). Typical Value = true. Default: False

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 6. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T3).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum control element output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum control element output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -5. Default: 0.0

xe.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Effective excitation transformer reactance (Xe).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0
